alert.note: Alert for Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:05PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iroquois and southwestern Benton Counties through 345 PM CDT/445 PM EDT/... At 304 PM CDT/404 PM EDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Watseka, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milford, Boswell, Stockland, Woodland, Wellington, Ambia, Dunnington and Claytonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
